SimulationFramework

Class Marker

  • java.lang.Object
    • SimulationFramework.Marker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WayPoint

    public class Marker
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable
    Markers are used to represent position on the canvas that Bot's can use for path finding. In algorithm simulation Markers can be either temporary or permanent. Permanent markers are only cleared when the simulation's "Reset" option is selected. Temporary markers are cleared when the simulation's "Clear" option is selected. Marker's size has a default value of 2. Can be changed with int getSize() and void setSize(int size).
    Since:
    8/8/2015
